SEARCH
Package org.opengrok.suggest.query

Interface SuggesterQuery

All Known Implementing Classes:
SuggesterFuzzyQuery, SuggesterPrefixQuery, SuggesterRangeQuery, SuggesterRegexpQuery, SuggesterWildcardQuery
public interface SuggesterQuery
Query that selects the terms that could be used as suggestions.
